entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WebView can not show whole page #10134
  • Easier way to read QueryProperty #10133
  • Currently the window on WinUI doesn't get any accessibility properties set #10131
    7.0
  • Shell.TitleView does not render on iOS 16 #10128
  • Update PageViewController with events we can hook into for lifecycle methods like ViewDidAppear #10126
  • DataTrigger doesn't work with Style property #10124
    Backlog
  • HotReload not working for changes to VerticalOptions #10122
    Backlog
  • AndroidMessageHandler or HttpClientHandler throw System.ObjectDisposedException: Cannot access a closed Stream #10121
  • Resources from a nuget are not available for {StaticResource ...} #10112
    Backlog
  • Connecting to SqlServer errors #10111
  • Android: Binding does not work when view is hidden #10109
    Backlog
  • Switch control on Windows ignores layout and align options #10107
    Backlog
  • .Maui Static Web Asset Build issue #10106

Closed

  • Measure not working correctly on Layouts with fixed size constraints #7531
    7.0-rc2
  • Android: UI elements disappear when showing page, the 2nd time #10108
  • [Windows] Changing MainPage overlaps layout with title bar #10123
  • Picker.ItemsSource does not update the picker after being manually set. #9739
  • Use ServiceCollection.MakeReadOnly in .NET 7 #6115
    7.0-rc1
  • Error Nu1101 Maui net6.0 Windows Desktop #9993

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't force the TextDirection on Android unless the content direction can't be determined #10132
    area/localization
  • Add release 6.0.536 #10129
    community ✨
  • Modify Controls Methods to use interfaces #10127
    7.0-rc2
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authorization from 6.0.8 to 6.0.9 #10120
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.1.4 to 1.1.5 #10119
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook from 6.0.8 to 6.0.9 #10118
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Google from 6.0.8 to 6.0.9 #10117
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.JSInterop from 6.0.8 to 6.0.9 #10116
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView from 6.0.8 to 6.0.9 #10115
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.MicrosoftAccount from 6.0.8 to 6.0.9 #10114
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web from 6.0.8 to 6.0.9 #10113
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, Blazor ❤️ MAUI

Merged

  • Compress Grid measurements for star rows/columns #10073
    area/layout 🔲, 7.0-rc2
  • [Build] Don't download library packs we don't have #10110
  • Remove MauiApplicationServiceCollection and use MakeReadOnly #10097
    area/hosting 🧩
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10105
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Fix layout and safe area on FlyoutPage #10083
    area/layout 🔲, 7.0-rc2
  • [Windows] Updated used ListViewItem style (avoid CornerRadius etc) #8584
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, partner/cat 😻, area/ListView, 7.0-rc2
  • Fix root page swapping #9955
    platform/android 🤖, area/navigation 🧭, 7.0-rc2
  • [iOS] Implement IsEnabled property on Editor #7611
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 7.0-rc2
  • [Android] Fix focused events in SearchBar #9918
    t/bug, area/a11y, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 7.0-rc2
  • [Android] Fire Completed event using ReturnType.Search #9632
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 7.0-rc2
  • Add visual state for PointerOver #10003
    area/Xaml </>, 7.0-rc2
  • Update docs animations #9746
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Force DisableFastUpToDateCheck=false for MAUI repo build #9083
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Selenium.WebDriver from 4.1.1 to 4.4.0 #10059
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Windows] Fix crash using MainDisplayInfoChanged on page constructor #10093
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞
  • Added pending changes to Essentials Permissions from Xamarin.Forms #10092
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞
